sentences.en: The church seems to be on the brink of schism.
sentences.cn: 该教会看来处于分裂的边缘。

sentences.en: In the 15th century a schism opened in the world of beer.
sentences.cn: 15世纪，啤酒界开始了一次强烈的意见分歧。

sentences.en: We are much too apt to look at schism in our church as an unmitigated evil.
sentences.cn: 我们很容易把自己教会中的分派看成是一种十恶不赦的罪恶。
